Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.assertions

Class CompilationAssert

java.lang.Object
org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<CompilationAssert,JctCompilation>
io.github.ascopes.jct.assertions.CompilationAssert
All Implemented Interfaces:
Assert<CompilationAssert,JctCompilation>, Descriptable<CompilationAssert>, ExtensionPoints<CompilationAssert,JctCompilation>
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public final class CompilationAssert extends AbstractAssert<CompilationAssert,JctCompilation>
Assertions that apply to a JctCompilation.
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

  • Constructor Details

    • CompilationAssert

      public CompilationAssert(JctCompilation value)
      Initialize this compilation assertion.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to assert on.

  • Method Details

    • isSuccessful

      public CompilationAssert isSuccessful()
      Assert that the compilation was successful.
      Returns:
      this assertion object.

    • isSuccessfulWithoutWarnings

      public CompilationAssert isSuccessfulWithoutWarnings()
      Assert that the compilation was successful and had no warnings.

      If warnings were treated as errors by the compiler, then this is identical to calling isSuccessful().

      Returns:
      this assertion object.

    • isFailure

      public CompilationAssert isFailure()
      Assert that the compilation was a failure.
      Returns:
      this assertion object.

    • diagnostics

      public DiagnosticListAssert diagnostics()
      Get assertions for diagnostics.
      Returns:
      assertions for the diagnostics.

    • fileManagerIsClosed

      public CompilationAssert fileManagerIsClosed()
      Assert that the file manager is closed.
      Returns:
      this assertion object to perform further assertions upon, if desired.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - if the file manager is unexpectedly open.

    • fileManagerIsOpen

      public CompilationAssert fileManagerIsOpen()
      Assert that the file manager is open.
      Returns:
      this assertion object to perform further assertions upon, if desired.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - if the file manager is unexpectedly closed.

    • packageGroup

      public PackageContainerGroupAssert packageGroup(JavaFileManager.Location location)
      Perform assertions on the given package group, if it has been configured.

      If not configured, this will return assertions on a null value instead.

      Parameters:
      location - the location to configure.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform.

    • moduleGroup

      public ModuleContainerGroupAssert moduleGroup(JavaFileManager.Location location)
      Perform assertions on the given module group, if it has been configured.

      If not configured, the value being asserted on will be null in value.

      Parameters:
      location - the location to configure.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform.

    • outputGroup

      public OutputContainerGroupAssert outputGroup(JavaFileManager.Location location)
      Perform assertions on the given output group, if it has been configured.

      If not configured, the value being asserted on will be null in value.

      Parameters:
      location - the location to configure.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform.

    • classOutput

      public OutputContainerGroupAssert classOutput()
      Get assertions on the path containing class outputs, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform on the class outputs.

    • sourceOutput

      public OutputContainerGroupAssert sourceOutput()
      Get assertions on the path containing generated source outputs, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform on the source outputs.

    • generatedHeaders

      public OutputContainerGroupAssert generatedHeaders()
      Get assertions on the path containing header outputs, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform on the header outputs.

    • classPath

      public PackageContainerGroupAssert classPath()
      Get assertions on the path containing the class path, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform on the class path.

    • sourcePath

      public PackageContainerGroupAssert sourcePath()
      Get assertions on the path containing the source path, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform on the source path, or assertions on a null value if no group exists for that location.

    • moduleSourcePath

      public ModuleContainerGroupAssert moduleSourcePath()
      Get assertions on the path containing the source path, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform on the source path, or assertions on a null value if no group exists for that location.

    • modulePath

      public ModuleContainerGroupAssert modulePath()
      Get assertions on the path containing the module path, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the assertions to perform on the module path, or assertions on a null value if no group exists for that location.
